SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.nbtEditor

Class AutoPersistentDataContainer

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.nbtEditor.AutoPersistentDataContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataContainer
public class AutoPersistentDataContainer extends Object implements AutoCloseable, org.bukkit.persistence.PersistentDataContainer
Represents a PersistentDataContainer that automatically saves the data to the item meta when closed.

When the object is closed, the data is saved to the item meta.

It can be used as follows: 

 
 try (var apdc = new AutoPersistentDataContainer(item)) {
     apdc.set(key, type, value);
     // Do stuff with the data.
 } // The data is now saved to the item.
